title: Taj Mahal
desc: One of the Seven Wonders of the World, the Taj Mahal is a symbol of eternal love built by Emperor Shah Jahan.

title: Jaipur City Palace
desc: A stunning blend of Mughal and Rajput architecture, the Jaipur City Palace is a cultural and historical landmark.

title: Kerala Backwaters
desc: Experience the scenic beauty of Kerala with houseboat cruises through serene backwaters surrounded by palm trees.

title: Golden Temple
desc: The holiest Gurdwara of Sikhism, the Golden Temple is renowned for its breathtaking beauty and peaceful atmosphere.

title: Goa Beaches
address: Baga, Calangute, and Anjuna Beaches, Goa
desc: Relax on the golden sands, enjoy thrilling water sports, and experience vibrant nightlife in Goa.

title: Mysore Palace
desc: An architectural marvel, the Mysore Palace is known for its grandeur and royal history of the Wadiyar dynasty.

title: Varanasi Ghats
desc: One of the worldâ€™s oldest cities, Varanasi offers spiritual experiences with mesmerizing Ganga Aarti on the ghats.

title: Ranthambore National Park
desc: Famous for Bengal tigers, Ranthambore offers thrilling safaris through wildlife-rich forests.

title: Charminar
address: Char Kaman, Ghansi Bazaar, Hyderabad, Telangana
desc: A historic mosque and iconic monument of Hyderabad, Charminar is a masterpiece of Indo-Islamic architecture.

title: Himalayan Trek
desc: Perfect for adventure seekers, the Himalayan treks near Manali offer stunning landscapes and snow-covered peaks.
